Neural Nets from Scratch Chapter 1 Intro

Neural Nets from Scratch Daniel Polites 2024-04-19 Chapter 1 Intro This is a write-up of iRisk’s Spring 2024 project: Neural Nets from Scratch The organization is: Single-Layer NN Notes intro notation & methodology for single-hidden layer neural network Digit Model GLMs on MNIST handwritten digits as an application intro Multi-Layer NN Notes intro notation & methodology for multi-hidden layer neural network Multi-Layer NN Model implementation of multi-layer neural network in R 1.0.1 Setup knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE) set.seed(50) library(tidyverse) ##
